title: Под напряжением
overview: Clinical psychologist Andrey Vysokov has a rare skill: he is able to literally "penetrate" an attacker's head and read the course of his thoughts and the logic of his actions. However, this ability prevents the hero from building normal relationships with people and makes him dependent on patients who are dangerous criminals and maniacs. Recently, together with investigator Irina Shumskaya, he has been investigating a series of murders that occurred in a small seaside town. This is not an ordinary case, and even an experienced Vysokov has to face incredible stress during the investigation.…
